SELECT ? AS one FROM "follows" WHERE "follows"."account_id" = $? AND "follows"."target_account_id" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "mutes" WHERE "mutes"."account_id" = $? AND "mutes"."target_account_id" = $? LIMIT $?

SELECT "accounts"."id", "accounts"."username", "accounts"."domain", "accounts"."private_key", "accounts"."public_key", "accounts"."created_at", "accounts"."updated_at", "accounts"."note", "accounts"."display_name", "accounts"."uri", "accounts"."url", "accounts"."avatar_file_name", "accounts"."avatar_content_type", "accounts"."avatar_file_size", "accounts"."avatar_updated_at", "accounts"."header_file_name", "accounts"."header_content_type", "accounts"."header_file_size", "accounts"."header_updated_at", "accounts"."avatar_remote_url", "accounts"."locked", "accounts"."header_remote_url", "accounts"."last_webfingered_at", "accounts"."inbox_url", "accounts"."outbox_url", "accounts"."shared_inbox_url", "accounts"."followers_url", "accounts"."protocol", "accounts"."memorial", "accounts"."moved_to_account_id", "accounts"."featured_collection_url", "accounts"."fields", "accounts"."actor_type", "accounts"."discoverable", "accounts"."also_known_as", "accounts"."silenced_at", "accounts"."suspended_at", "accounts"."hide_collections", "accounts"."avatar_storage_schema_version", "accounts"."header_storage_schema_version", "accounts"."devices_url", "accounts"."suspension_origin", "accounts"."sensitized_at", "accounts"."trendable", "accounts"."reviewed_at", "accounts"."requested_review_at", "accounts"."indexable" FROM "accounts" INNER JOIN "mutes" ON "accounts"."id" = "mutes"."target_account_id" WHERE "mutes"."account_id" = $? ORDER BY "accounts"."id" ASC LIMIT $?

SELECT a.attnum, a.attname
FROM pg_attribute a
WHERE a.attrelid = ?
AND a.attnum IN (?)

SELECT a.attnum, a.attname
FROM pg_attribute a
WHERE a.attrelid = ?
AND a.attnum IN (?, ?)

SELECT distinct i.relname, d.indisunique, d.indkey, pg_get_indexdef(d.indexrelid), t.oid,
                pg_catalog.obj_description(i.oid, ?) AS comment, d.indisvalid
FROM pg_class t
INNER JOIN pg_index d ON t.oid = d.indrelid
INNER JOIN pg_class i ON d.indexrelid = i.oid
LEFT JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = t.relnamespace
WHERE i.relkind IN (?, ?)
  AND d.indisprimary = ?
  AND t.relname = ?
  AND n.nspname = ANY (current_schemas(?))
ORDER BY i.relname
